data.text: @right_wally @lufthansa Hi there, if the flight is operated by Austrian, you also check in with Austrian. Kind regards, Ivana
@asdfghjkljacque Dear Jacqueline, I'm really sorry but all our channels are pretty busy. There's no other way besides calling the Customer Service. Kind regards, Ivana

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @asdfghjkljacque Hi Jacqueline, you can purchase a free neighbor seat via our Customer Service Center. Please find our worldwide numbers via https://t.co/FFefe6Jqyt Our respective colleagues will be happy to further assist you. Kind regards, James

@ellamcmcmc  Hi Ella, online check-in is not available for departures from Split airport. It's one of the exceptions listed on our homepage: https://t.co/W0FvCUelhA My colleagues will gladly assist you at the airport check-in. Kind regards, Lyndsay

urls.title: Information about carry-on baggage
urls.description: What can be taken on board the aircraft? Find out about the permitted size and weight of your hand luggage and what items are allowed on board before your trip.

data.text: @taifbehnam96 Hi, in case the connecting flight is operated by Austrian Airlines our hand baggage regulation will apply https://t.co/X2VNyvrhjX. Kind regards, Christine

@vierlingerj Hi, I regret to inform you that we don't have any other rebooking options for today or tomorrow. That's why you were rebooked to the 19th of April. I'm sorry that I don't have any better news for you. Kind regards, James
@dynamicdhiraj Hi, I have informed our respective colleagues about the urgency of your case. Please have a bit more patience as you will be contacted soon. Kind regards, James
@VierlingerJ Hi Julian, I'm sorry to hear about the inconvenience caused by the cancellation. Have you been rebooked already? Kind regards, James

entity.description: 4月17日は、キリスト教でイエス・キリストが復活した日とされるイースターです。このモーメントは自動でツイートを掲載しています。

data.text: @g_filioussis Hi Georgios, Happy Easter and thanks for your feedback. We'll pass it on to our crew. Kind regards, Lyndsay
@taifbehnam96 Hi, they are fine. Kind regards, Funda
@taifbehnam96 Hi there, if your carry-on is exceeding 8 kg, there's no other option than to check it in, unfortunately. Best regards, Christiane
@eweindling Hi, please write an e-mail to viellos@austrian.com Kind regards, James

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @MahmudAsrar Hi Mahmud, we regret reading about this unfortunate situation. Please feel free to seek reimbursement by submitting a claim here: https://t.co/dAXMVijisj Kind regards, Chris
@llhogan7 Hi Lauren, what is the emergency about? Does it concern your booking only or the flight? Please send us a DM. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@hafsa_memon Hi Hafsa, please send us a PM with your booking code so we can check for you. Kind regards, Lyndsay https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@SquawkTracker @SquawkAlert During landing gear extension on approach, an error message occurred. After several checks, the error message turned out to be false and the aircraft landed safely. The safety of our passengers and crew is always our top priority,  thus all appropriate safety measures were taken.

@KingsCross_LHR_ During landing gear extension on approach, an error message occurred. After several checks, the error message turned out to be false and the aircraft landed safely. The safety of our passengers and crew is always our top priority,  thus all appropriate safety measures were taken.

@emergenciaaerea During landing gear extension on approach, an error message occurred. After several checks, the error message turned out to be false and the aircraft landed safely. The safety of our passengers and crew is always our top priority,  thus all appropriate safety measures were taken.

@GDarkconrad During landing gear extension on approach, an error message occurred. After several checks, the error message turned out to be false and the aircraft landed safely. The safety of our passengers and crew is always our top priority,  thus all appropriate safety measures were taken.

@MartiTesla Hi, You do not need a test for the stay on board. However, if your destination requires a test you need to show it before boarding. For information on the currently valid entry and transit regulations, please contact the responsible authorities directly. Kind regards, Chris

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @tateendah @flyethiopian Hi there, thank you for reaching out. Please submit your request via the following contact form https://t.co/9qm6soTI2O. Kind regards, Derya

@thejonsilver Hi Jon, thank you for reaching out. We are sorry to hear that you have a reason to complain. Please send us your booking code in a DM, we´ll gladly take a closer look into it. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@EWEINDLING Hi Manu, we are sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you. Please continue to refer to the responsible colleagues for any potential queries or revision requests.

@mrnmps Hi Marianna, The availability of the flights and the fares change constantly since bookings are created, reservations cancelled, flights rebooked, tickets returned and special promotions offered. Therefore the prices can be moving up and down. Kind regards, Chris

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @johnwoodward Hi John, unfortunately, there are only the numbers shown on this list https://t.co/kffNGSPtHP. You can dial any of them. You can also send us your booking code and your request in a DM. We´ll gladly check it for you. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@lenadoppel Hi Lena, wir werden dein Feedback weiterleiten. Liebe Grüße, Christine

As a first mover in Austria we fuel our aircraft with 1,500 tons of SAF, saving CO2 emissions equivalent to over 330 flights from Vienna to London. Our SAF is produced locally at the refinery in Schwechat getting from there directly into our tanks! 2/2

👉https://t.co/Ri8UCI5Fyc https://t.co/5VClvaI4OC

data.text:
How does your Schnitzel bring us one step closer to carbon neutrality? ♻️✈️

Since this March we are uplifting Sustainable Aviation Fuel made from Austrian used cooking oil from our longstanding partner @omv! 1/2
@john_seabreeze Hi John, I've already replied to your other posting. Best regards, Christiane

data.text: @Oliver60202195 Hi Oliver, wir haben dir gerade via Facebook geantwortet. Liebe Grüße, Christine
@Oliver60202195 Hallo Oliver, wie ich sehen konnten, hat dir meine Kollegin bereits auf dein anderes Posting geantwortet. Liebe Grüße, Christiane

@__TheJohn__ Hi John, es tut uns leid zu lesen, dass du positiv getestet wurdest. Bitte sende uns deinen Buchungscode und deinen Sitzplatz in einer DM. Wir leiten das gerne an die zuständigen KollegInnen weiter. Werde bald gesund🙏 Liebe Grüße, Derya
@BarbTsilosani Hi Barbare, but what exactly is the issue? Please send us a DM. Kind regards, Christine
@BarbTsilosani Hi Barbare, how can we exactly assist you? Please send us a DM. Kind regards, Christine
@Elodie_G Hi there, thank you for reaching out. Please send your request to our colleagues at specialcases@austrian.com. Kind regards, Derya
@nikolarasic870 @bengurionairpor [2/2] We look forward to providing you with a smoother experience next time. Kind regards, James

@nikolarasic870 @bengurionairpor [1/2] Hi Nikola, thank you for reaching out. We are sorry to hear about your bad experience with us. We will definitely bring your feedback to the attention of our respective departments in order to improve our service standards.
@leoll1234 Hi Leon Oe, danke für dein Feedback, dass freut uns sehr zu hören. Wir werden es weiterleiten. Liebe Grüße, Christine
@consultilands Hi Chris, sorry for the long waiting time. Please tell us your booking code in a DM and we'll try to help. Kind regards, James

@DenisaPiatti Hi Denise, we regret to read that you are not able to contact us via phone. Our lines are currently very busy. We can only advise you to try it again a bit later. Kind regards, Christine
@happypei_ Hi, es tut uns leid, dass du Schwierigkeiten hast uns zu erreichen. Bitte sende uns deinen Buchungscode und dein Anliegen in einer DM. Wir sehen uns das gerne an. LG Sara
@markanze Hi Mark, due to the current situation our handling time is longer than usual. Our colleagues will get back to you as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience. Kind regards, Sara
@dokydeezer Hallo, bitte sende uns deinen Buchungscode in einer DM. LG Sara
@katuskas Hi there, you can also drop off your luggage. Kind regards, Sara
@dokydeezer Hi, sorry für die Unannehmlichkeiten. Wie können wir dir weiterhelfen? Liebe Grüße, James

@hengggy Hi, we will partly reimburse you for any expenses you had due to your missing luggage. In accordance with regulations, we will cover 50% of your expenses for clothes and 100% for cosmetic products. Best regards, Christiane

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @hengggy Hi, please send in your receipts via the following online form: https://t.co/4nSWoSIBnF Best regards, Christiane
@eltschiggolo Hi Martin, leider kommt es derzeit zu längeren Wartezeiten. Schicke uns bitte deine Buchungscode und wir schauen uns das gerne an. Liebe Grüße, Lyndsay

domain.name: States
domain.description: States, provinces, or prefectures, like California or Fukushima Prefecture

data.text: @virginia_mallin Hi Virginia, I'm sorry to hear about this. Did you already contact the phone number on your lost baggage report? Our respective colleagues will provide you with further updates. Kind regards, James
@rhornik  Hi Richard, our colleagues are currently receiving an unprecedented amount of calls. Please try calling in the morning when it is usually less busy. Kind regards, Lyndsay
@eltschiggolo Hallo Martin, es tut uns sehr leid, dass du von einer Flugstreichung betroffen bist. Gerne kannst du uns deinen Buchungscode schicken und wir sehen uns das näher an. Liebe Grüße, Sarah

@_mausiii_ [2/2] Ich kann dir versichern, dass wir in vollem Einsatz für dich da sind und wir alles tun, damit wir dir rasch wieder unser gewohntes Service bieten können. Leider können wir über Social Media keine kostenpflichte Umbuchung durchführen. LG, Sarah

@_mausiii_ [1/2] Hi Aline, es tut mir leid, dass du so lange warten mussten. Wir haben aktuell wieder sehr viele Anrufe. Derzeit benötigen unsere Fluggäste auch mehr Zeit für ihre Anliegen. Natürlich wollen wir uns auch für jeden Passagier die Zeit nehmen, die er braucht.

@gregoltsov Hi Greg, to avoid misunderstandings, please contact your specific embassy or consulate directly, as federal authorities, not the airline, handle transit regulations and entry restrictions. Kind regards, James
@malwerro Hi Mal, we are very sorry that the lines got cut off. Please send us your booking code in a DM. We´ll gladly have a closer look into this matter. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@johnnyearle Hi Jonathan, thank you for reaching out. Please send us your booking code in a DM. We´ll gladly check the matter for you. Kind regards, Derya

@yessinkah Hi Jessie, thank you for reaching out. We are sorry to read that you are affected by a flight delay. Please accept my apologies for any inconvenience this has caused. Please send us your booking code in a DM. We´ll gladly check it for you. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

data.text: @dynamicdhiraj @lufthansa Hi, unfortunately, our colleagues currently have a high volume of requests. Please be assured that they will respond in due course. Kind regards, Lyndsay
@DarrenW09331767 Hi there, thank you for reaching out. The fare conditions will be shown to you when choosing the flight and the travel class. Please read them carefully. Kind regards, Derya

@lnvoyageuse Hi Elena, we are sorry to hear about your experience and can only apologize for any inconvenience caused. If you haven't sent your feedback yet to Customer Relations, please do so via our homepage: https://t.co/oFk3wpDhNG - best regards, Brigitte

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @robrobertrober Hi, hast du unsere Online Rückerstattungsformular schon ausgefüllt? https://t.co/fqq8Htrux1  Liebe Grüße, Lyndsay

@hengggy Hi, we apologize again for any inconvenience. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Best regards, Brigitte

@mavje73 Hi Mary Ann, the minimum connecting time for Vienna airport is 25 minutes. In case your flight will be delayed and would result in missing your connecting flight, Austrian will take care of you and rebook you to an alternative flight. Best regards, Brigitte
@Maddog77283 Hi there, in this case the travel agent needs to contact the Agency Support Desk. We as the Social Media Team cannot assist in this case, unfortunately. Kind regards, Sara
@maddog77283 Hi Will,.we can't answer this question. Please contact a travel agency of your choice if you would like to know. Kind regards, Sarah
@oof28745350 Hi Lin, since you have booked your flights through a travel agency/online platform please get in touch with them directly. Kind regards, Derya
@roya_rahnejat Hi Roya, the delivery will be to the address you have left with my colleagues when doing the lost report. Kind regards, Derya
@roya_rahnejat Hi Roya, unfortunately, we cannot speed up the delivery process, unfortunately. Kind regards, Derya
@Jimin_bts_hot Hi, we already replied to your previous message. Kind regards, Christine
@roya_rahnejat Hi, please also try this number +44 871 288 7354? Kind regards, Christine

With the current #Fitfor55 proposals we risk massive competitive damages for EU Airlines & EU Airports. It will shift business and #emissions towards non-EU countries. We ask for policy changes to enable a global level playing field! @flughafen_wien https://t.co/hWbyQg3Np6

@roya_rahnejat Hi Roya, I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Please contact our colleagues from the arrival service in order to locate your baggage and make a report. Our colleagues there will be glad to assist you.
Kind regards, Christine

@RWang1998 Hi Ray, thank you for reaching out. We regret to hear that you are affected by a flight irregularity. Please send us your booking code in a DM. We´ll gladly take a closer look into it. Kind regards, Derya
@Jimin_bts_hot Hi Sreylin, I have replied to your other message. Kind regards, Derya
@hengggy [2/2]  at the Lost & Found counter at the airport, is where all information about your case is collected. The contact person there will be glad to assist you. Kind regards, Derya

@hengggy [1/2] Hi Taylor, thank you for reaching out. We regret to hear that your baggage was not dully delivered. Please turn to the contact on your Property Irregularity Report or PIR – you’ve received the Property Irregularity Report
@al_ifriqii Hi Ahmad, no, currently there are no other transit requirements for Austria. Best regards, Christiane
@JoharReshma Hi there, please send us your booking code so we can have a closer look at it. Best regards, Christiane
@TGrunwell Hi Tracy, I'm sorry to hear that your baggage didn't make it. Please contact the phone number on your baggage report to receive further updates on your missing bag. Kind regards, James

@Loncyloncy Hi, we are sorry about the inconvenience and thank you for your feedback which we will use as an opportunity to remind our team in Tel Aviv about the check-in standards. Kind regards, Christine

@thekate78 Hi Katherine,  I'm sorry for the long waiting time on the phone. Unfortunately, we are experiencing an increased number of calls at the moment. Please tell us your request in a DM. We´ll be happy to assist you. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@hmsgerlach Hi Stefan, we are truly sorry that your luggage is delayed. We apologize for any inconvenience. Kind regards, Sarah

@A05664208 Hi there, we regret to learn that you're affected by a flight irregularity and want to apologize for any inconvenience caused. Please send us your booking code in a DM so we can have a closer look at alternative flights for you. Best regards, Christiane https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

data.text: This year’s Easter egg hunt takes place in the Mediterranean  🐰✈️ 690,000 bookings within 2 weeks and +380% more bookings compared to 2021 on many routes 🌍We are very happy to have those record breaking numbers in our Easter nest 🙏🏻 Find out more ➡️ https://t.co/C8TBbSb7dw https://t.co/LjKTzGnEaJ
@ADNPGN Hi Adrien, we regret to hear that you are affected by a delay. Please send us your booking code in a DM. We´ll gladly check your connecting flight. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@every1calmdown5 Hi Jay, I do not understand what the issue was but you're now checked in. You can change seats if not suitable. Kind regards, Ivana
@holdermummy Hi there, we already replied to your DM. Kind regards, Chris
@azshahrak Hi, we just replied to you on FB. Best regards, Brigitte

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @ruralsplashgl Hi Rural, we're currently getting a lot of calls. From experience, I recommend calling between 8:00 a.m. and 9:00 a.m. as the waiting time is less than ten minutes, https://t.co/Af7NsKSvP9 - Best regards, Brigitte
@bvendeaud Hi Beatrice, thank you for the nice words and feedback. Best regards, Brigitte

@gresch Hi Karsten, aufgrund der derzeitigen Situation können wir das Begleitservice leider nur auf den Direktflügen anbieten. Für Umsteigeverbindungen gilt das Angebot derzeit leider nicht. Sorry für die Verwirrung. LG Sara
@laurawerwowie Hi Laura, we regret to hear that you haven't heard back from us. Please send us the reference number of your inquiry in a DM. We will be happy to have a closer look. Kind regards, Sara

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @gagneux62718619 Hi, sorry you had issues with your upgrade. Please fill in our online refund form: https://t.co/xkl78gtyYH Kind regards, Lyndsay
@yellowmehdi Hi Mehdi, I've just replied to your DM. Best regards, Christiane
@dat_sophie Liebe Sophie, wir schreiben dir bereits auf Insta und sind das gleiche Team :-) Liebe Grüße, Ivana
@varun_nahata  Hi, yes please send us your PNR in a DM so we can check for you. Kind regards, Lyndsay
@MajaCellist Hi Maja, please send us your booking code in a DM. Thank you! Kind regards, Christine
@catherinewien Hi Catherine, we have already replied to your other posting. Best regards, Christiane

#Servus and welcome back dear #YouthOlympicTeamAustria 🇦🇹 #Congrats 👏🏼 on your fanstastic performance and 10 medals 🥇🥈🥉at the #YoungOlympicFestival2022 in Finland 🇫🇮
We were happy to have you aboard again ✈️ https://t.co/LBw8qjVc6q
@Nicolas_Alvarez Hi Nic, thank you for reaching out. Please send us your booking code in a DM. We´ll gladly have a closer look at the issue. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
